title: Minute Man National Historical Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Reservations       Reservations for Field Trips: Please see Teachers: Plan A Field Trip for more information. The Road to Revolution There is no fee to see The Road to Revolution. Group Reservations: Groups of 15 people or more may make a reservation to ensure a particular show time. Reservations can be made online at recreation.gov. Please note that there is a fee of $1.50 per person for reservations.  Wayside- Reopening June 18, 2016      Fees    Adults  $7.00    Seniors and Students over 17 with ID's  $5.00    Children under 17  Free    Group Tours  $150.00     For group tour information, call (978) 318 - 7826. Federal Pass Program  Effective July 11, 2016 Minute Man NHP is no longer selling Annual Passes and Golden Age passes.  For more information about the pass program, visit: http://www.nps.gov/findapark/passes.htm Free passes:  Military,  Access, and Every Kid in a Park will continue to be available at Minute  Man Visitor Center, June 19 -October 30. Special Use Permits Call (978) 318 - 7828 e-mail
